inclusion.criterion: Insulin resistant (HOMA-IR≥2.3) PCOS women between 20-36 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: infertility more than 1 year and normal serum prolactin
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of PCOS according to the Rotterdam Criteria
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: 21-hydroxylase deficient nonclassic adrenal hyperplasia (NCAH) on the 3rd day of a spontaneous menses or withdrawal bleeding induced by Provera
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: hypothyroidism not treated and normal TSH
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis, but was treated with Levothyroxine and symptoms improved. She is still overweight.
